description: The Special Cell of Delhi Police on Friday busted a racket of illegal inter-state arms dealer.
title: Illegal weapon supplier racket busted in Delhi, three held
title_page: Illegal weapon supplier racket busted in Delhi, three held
text:
The police have arrested three people, including a woman who was leading the gang.
30 weapons, including two carbine and 26 pistols have been recovered from their possession. 20 pistols were found hidden in the battery of the truck.
The arms were being transported from Madhya Pradesh and some of these were to be delivered to Mohammed Hafiz, a residence of Uttar Pradesh's Meerut. (ANI)
